title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repository providing a lightweight, extensible framework for running large language models locally with a simple CLI and REST API.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript SDK for Ollama, enabling browser and Node.js integration with the local LLM service.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client library for Ollama, providing synchronous and asynchronous APIs to interact with local models.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package that wraps Ollama as a native LLM and embeddings provider for building complex LLM pipelines.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich, self-hosted web interface for Ollama modeled after ChatGPT UI, supporting multi-model chats and document retrieval.

title: ollama4j
summary: Unofficial Java SDK for Ollama, offering fluent builders and async wrappers to integrate local LLMs into JVM applications.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Community Rust CLI that wraps the Ollama REST API with extra utilities like model search, bulk pull, and interactive chat.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Experimental GitHub Copilot-like plugin that uses Ollama local models for IDE code completion and inline chat.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal retrieval-augmented-generation template using Ollama, ChromaDB and LangChain to chat with private documents.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hosted Discord bot that brings Ollama models into any server with slash commands, thread support and moderation hooks.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node selection and horizontal scaling options.

title: ollama-nvidia-triton
summary: Bridge project exposing Ollama models through NVIDIA Triton Inference Server for enterprise-grade serving and benchmarking.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration letting developers use Ollama models as generators or embedders in production NLP pipelines.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Community-maintained C# SDK for .NET applications to consume Ollama REST endpoints with strongly-typed models.

title: ollama-slackbot
summary: Lightweight Slack bot written in Python that listens for mentions and replies using an Ollama backend, deployable via one Docker command.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that caches and serves Ollama models inside CI pipelines for reproducible LLM-based testing and code review.

title: ollama-terraform
summary: Terraform module to provision GPU-enabled AWS EC2 or GCP instances with Ollama pre-installed and systemd service configured.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Unofficial async Rust crate that wraps Ollama endpoints using reqwest and provides Tokio-based streaming helpers.

title: ollama-kit
summary: Swift Package Manager library for macOS/iOS apps to communicate with a local Ollama instance, including Combine publishers.

title: ollama-models
summary: Official registry of community-contributed Modelfiles for Llama-3, Phi-3, Mistral, CodeLlama and other GGUF weights optimized for Ollama.
